subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. informed the Timberwolves that the referee crew should have called the Lakers’ Kobe Bryant for a foul on a potential game-tying 3-pointer at the buzzer.
snippet: The N.B.A. informed the Timberwolves that the referee crew should have called the Lakers’ Kobe Bryant for a foul on a potential game-tying 3-pointer at the buzzer.
